publicationStmt.ab: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

p.seg: Suppose there is a granary whose width is three zhang whose length is four zhang five chi and whose capacity in unhusked millet is ten thousand hu One asks how much the height is

Procedure one puts (on the calculating surface) the chi of the productvolume (ji) corresponding to ten thousand hu Width and length multiplied by one another makes the divisor Dividing the dividend by the divisor yields the Chi of the height One divides the productvolume (ji) by the area (mi formed by the width and the length
